Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LL-37 (16-32)[E1G; F2,12BIP; I5,9l; R8ORN; L13l], Merecidin

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Amino Acid Composition Determines Peptide Activity Spectrum and Hot-Spot-Based Design of Merecidin.
Literature.Author: Wang X, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Narayana JL, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=300 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=48 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(80-90% Killing=12.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(30-40% Killing=6.2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=12.5µM)
